EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for registering for this complimentary live webinar.
You will receive a reminder email one week and one day prior to the live webinar. Your webinar information is listed to the right.
Steve Wirth and Charlie Barry look forward to an engaging discussion on May 31st and are glad that you've decided to join!
pwwemslaw.com tritech.com
See online on May 31!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/fxzrbrk
DATE: Thursday May 31, 2012 TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT SPEAKERS: Steve Wirth, Page Wolfberg and Wirth Charlie Barry, TriTech Senior Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
